alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Garrard; Jessamine; Lincoln; Madison; Mercer; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 10:16PM EDT until June 25 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central Kentucky... Mercer County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Woodford County in central Kentucky... Garrard County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Jessamine County in central Kentucky... Northern Boyle County in central Kentucky... West central Madison County in central Kentucky... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1016 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harrodsburg, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Danville, Harrodsburg, Lancaster, Mccreary, Burgin, Oregon, Caldwell Manor, Marksbury, Talmage and Gilbert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Boyle; Garrard; Jessamine; Lincoln; Madison; Mercer; Woodford
